372. MPI Environmenta Management C++ Bindings


Up: C++ Bindings (deprecated) Next: The Info Object C++ Bindings Previous: Process Topologies C++ Bindings 


namespace MPI {
{ void Comm::Abort(int errorcode) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ int Add_error_class() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ int Add_error_code(int errorclass) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Add_error_string(int errorcode, const char* string) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void* Alloc_mem(Aint size, const Info& info) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Comm::Call_errhandler(int errorcode) const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void File::Call_errhandler(int errorcode) const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Win::Call_errhandler(int errorcode) const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ static Errhandler Comm::Create_errhandler(Comm::Errhandler_function* function) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ static Errhandler File::Create_errhandler(File::Errhandler_function* function) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ static Errhandler Win::Create_errhandler(Win::Errhandler_function* function) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Finalize() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Errhandler::Free() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Free_mem(void *base) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ Errhandler Comm::Get_errhandler() const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ Errhandler File::Get_errhandler() const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ Errhandler Win::Get_errhandler() const (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ int Get_error_class(int errorcode) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Get_error_string(int errorcode, char* name, int& resultlen) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Get_processor_name(char* name, int& resultlen) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Get_version(int& version, int& subversion) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Init() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Init(int& argc, char**& argv) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ bool Is_finalized() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ bool Is_initialized() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Comm::Set_errhandler(const Errhandler& errhandler) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void File::Set_errhandler(const Errhandler& errhandler) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ void Win::Set_errhandler(const Errhandler& errhandler) (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ double Wtick() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }
{ double Wtime() (binding deprecated, see Section Deprecated since MPI-2.2 ) }

};
